DOC.brief_summary: The aim study premedication efficacy analgesic post endodontic pain . Sixty-six healthy adult volunteer include criterion , participate . The patient divide 3 group randomly give one pre medication include 1 ) 10 mg Ketorolac , 2 ) 10 mg Ketorolac plus 1000mg Acetaminophen , 3 ) Placebo , 45 minute apply injection . All patient receive standard root canal treatment . Patients record post treatment pain use Heft parker Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) . Success consider mild pain ( VAS≤54 ) need take analgesic . Data analyse use Mann-U-Whitney Kruskal-wallis test .
DOC.brief_title: Premedication Efficacy Oral Ketorolac Ketorolac/ Acetaminophen Post Treatment Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study premedication efficacy analgesic post endodontic pain . Sixty-six healthy adult volunteer age range 18-65 , non smoke medicine consumption , non pregnant break feed n't receive analgesic 24 hour treatment , participate . The patient divide 3 group randomly give one premedications include 1 ) 10 mg Ketorolac , 2 ) 10 mg Ketorolac plus 1000mg Acetaminophen , 3 ) Placebo , 45 minute treatment . All patient receive standard root canal treatment . Patients record post treatment pain use Heft parker Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) . Success consider mild pain ( VAS≤54 ) need take analgesic 6 , 12 , 24 48 hour interval follow treatment . Data analyse use Mann-U-Whitney Kruskal-wallis test .
DOC.criteria: Patients age range 1865 without systemic disease without medicine consumption non smoke non pregnant non breast feed asymptomatic irreversible pulpitis ( Visual Analog Scale ≤ 54 ) one mandibular molar need root canal treatment without medicine consumption analgesic sedation understand sign VAS consent form .
